alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 30 at 10:53PM AKST until February 01 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW FOR THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Moist southerly flow will override cool outflow winds in the north bringing snow Wednesday into Thursday afternoon. Expect snow to begin late Wednesday morning, with the heaviest rates expected overnight into Thursday morning. If outflow winds are not as persistent, we could see a rain/snow mix for Juneau and Icy Strait, severely impacting snow totals. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM WEDNESDAY TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 11 inches for Haines and Skagway. Snow accumulations of 9 to 14 inches are expected for Juneau. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway, Haines Borough and Klukwan and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From 3 PM Wednesday to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult and is discouraged unless it is an emergency. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Heaviest snowfall rates will be between 3 pm and Midnight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
